Title: Drink of the Month - Springbank 25 Scotch
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 22:48:17 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 1059 Last-Modified: Friday, 06-Dec-96 19:31:03 GMT Drink of the Month - Springbank 25 Scotch Drink of the Month - Springbank 25 Scotch This is the perfect Scotch to celebrate those major events in one's life, like completing one's PhD.
